1626310.name: Fantasy Grounds - Vampire The Masquerade 5th Edition Companion
1626310.description:
Vampire The Masquerade 5th Edition Companion

Vampire: The Masquerade Companion, a free digital supplement that brings three highly-anticipated playable clans to Vampire: The Masquerade 5th Edition, is available for download right now!
Vampire: The Masquerade Companion contains:
  • Three vampire clans: Tzimisce, Ravnos, Salubri
  • Discipline powers representing each of the new clans
  • Expanded rules and roleplaying information for ghouls and mortals
  • Details on each clan's view on vampire coteries
  • New Merits for players characters
  • Rules errata to Vampire: The Masquerade 5th Edition
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Colin Richardson
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Vampire the Masquerade 5th Edition ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
